facts: Employer threatened to fire employee immediately if not signed
Employee had no reasonable alternative employment
Agreement was signed under pressure without time to consult attorney
asp_facts: contract(c1). parties(c1, employer, employee). subject_matter(c1, non_compete). duress(c1, yes). wrongful_threat(c1, yes). no_reasonable_alternative(c1, yes). free_will(c1, no). economic_duress(c1, yes). coerced_assent(c1, yes).
question: Can employee void the non-compete agreement?
rationale: Economic duress makes a contract voidable. The employer's threat of immediate termination, combined with lack of reasonable alternatives and pressure to sign immediately, constitutes duress that overcame the employee's free will.
